00016 #define PIN_AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL 13  
00017 #define PIN_AUXILIARYOUTPUT_VOLTAGE 0   
00019 #define AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL_ON  LOW
00020 #define AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL_OFF HIGH

00025 DFRobotPowerShield::DFRobotPowerShield()
00026     :   m_voltageMin( 0 )
00027     ,   m_voltageMax( 25.6 )

00029     /* Initialize input/outputs */

00039 void    DFRobotPowerShield::init()
00040 {
00041     pinMode( PIN_AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL, OUTPUT );
00042     pinMode( PIN_AUXILIARYOUTPUT_VOLTAGE, INPUT );
00043 
00044     this->setOutputEnabled( false );
00045 }
00046

00057 bool    DFRobotPowerShield::outputEnabled() const
00058 {
00059     bool    ret = false;
00060 
00061     if( digitalRead( PIN_AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL ) == AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL_ON ) {
00062         ret = true;
00063     } else {
00064         ret = false;
00065     }
00066 
00067     return ret;
00068 }
00069

00071 /* ######################################################################### */
00072 
00079 void    DFRobotPowerShield::setOutputEnabled(const bool &argEnabled)
00080 {
00081     if( argEnabled == true ) {
00082         digitalWrite( PIN_AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL, AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL_ON );
00083     } else {
00084         digitalWrite( PIN_AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL, AUXILIARYOUTPUT_CONTROL_OFF );
00085     }
00086 }

00100 void    DFRobotPowerShield::setVoltageRange(float argMin, float argMax)
00101 {
00102     this->m_voltageMin  = argMin;
00103     this->m_voltageMax  = argMax;
00104 }

00114 float   DFRobotPowerShield::voltage() const
00115 {
00116     float raw   = analogRead( PIN_AUXILIARYOUTPUT_VOLTAGE );
00117 
00118 //    Serial.print( "DFRobotPowerShield::voltage::analog == " );
00119 //    Serial.println( raw );
00120 
00121 //    return map( raw * 100,
00122 //                0.0, 102400.0,
00123 //                this->m_voltageMin * 100.0, this->m_voltageMax * 100.0 ) / 100.0;
00124 
00125     /* Equivalent to map() but uses float (not that good because of divisions
00126      * but shall be ok) */
00127     return  this->m_voltageMin
00128             + (this->m_voltageMax - this->m_voltageMin )
00129             * ( raw / 1024.0) ;
00130 }
